kubejs.ponder.departure_portal_scene.hea: A portal to your original world
kubejs.ponder.departure_portal_scene.tex: You can create a portal to go to your original world. You can activate it with a singularity
Your trains can travel through the portal
kubejs.ponder.end_portal_scene.text_1: You can create a portal to go to the End. You can activate it with a dragon heart
kubejs.ponder.end_portal_scene.text_2: Your trains can travel through the portal
kubejs.ponder.glacio_portal_scene.text_1: You can create a portal to go to Glacio. You can activate it with a flint and steel
kubejs.ponder.glacio_portal_scene.text_2: Your trains can travel through the portal
kubejs.ponder.mars_portal_scene.text_1: You can create a portal to go to Mars. You can activate it with a flint and steel
kubejs.ponder.mars_portal_scene.text_2: Your trains can travel through the portal
kubejs.ponder.mercury_portal_scene.text_: You can create a portal to go to Mercury. You can activate it with a flint and steel
Your trains can travel through the portal
kubejs.ponder.moon_portal_scene.text_1: You can create a portal to go to the Moon. You can activate it with a osmium ingot
kubejs.ponder.moon_portal_scene.text_2: Your trains can travel through the portal
kubejs.ponder.twilight_portal_scene.head: A portal to the Twilight Forest
kubejs.ponder.twilight_portal_scene.text: You can create a portal to go to the Twilight Forest. You can activate it with a flint and steel
Your trains can travel through the portal
kubejs.ponder.venus_portal_scene.text_1: You can create a portal to go to Venus. You can activate it with a flint and steel
kubejs.ponder.venus_portal_scene.text_2: Your trains can travel through the portal
